滊滊滊

滊字的基本解释

滊
qì
古同“汽”。

滊
xì
水名。

滊
xiē
盐池。一说以甘水和咸水为盐。

滊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qì］
［《字彙》許訖切］
同“汔1”。
[②]［qì］
［《集韻》丘既切，去未，溪。］
亦作“滊1”。
(1)水蒸气。
(2)方言。犹蒸。

滊字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滊； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页642第13
【玉篇】許氣切【集韻】許旣切，?音欷。水名。　又【集韻】許竭切，音歇。【字林】鹽池。一曰以甘水和鹹水爲鹽曰滊。

滊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滊字的起名意思

暂无。

Stretch
qì
Gu Tong "steam".
Stretch
xì
Water name.
Stretch
xiē
Salt pond. One talks about using sweet water and brackish water as salt.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qì］
["Zihui" Xu Fuqie]
Same as "汔1".
[②]［qì］
["Jiyun" Qiu Jiqie, Quwei, Xi. ]
Also known as "Zhen 1".
(1) Water vapor.
(2) Dialects. Still steaming.
Stretch
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Volume 1] [Shui Character Department] 　滊; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 642 13
[Jade articles] Xu Qiqie [Jiyun] Xu Yangqie,? Yinju. Water name.　[Jiyun] Xu Liqie, the sound rests. [Word Forest] Yanchi. The first is to use sweet water and salt water as salt to stretch.
